players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think Diana is acting suspiciously and might be the mafia. Bob, please trust me over her."
Diana: "I was the detective. I investigated Alice and found her mafia. Charlie died last night. Bob, trust me."
Bob: "text"
Diana: "I investigated Alice and found her mafia. Charlie died last night. Alice knows I'm the detective and is shifting blame. Bob, vote her and protect the town."
You: "Bob, you know I'm the only mafia left. Diana's claims don't add up. Vote her out."
Bob: remained silent.

Alice was arrested
